function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Tourism leading to negative environmental and social costs","Impact":"Destruction of natural habitats, pollution, and social disruption","Mitigation":"Promoting sustainable tourism practices, implementing environmental protection measures, and supporting local communities","Technologies":"Sustainable tourism certifications, eco-friendly infrastructure, and waste management systems","People":"Local communities, natural habitats, and tourists","Owner":"Tourism providers, local governments, and tourists"},{"Description":"General anxiety leading to low-risk vacation choices","Impact":"Reduced economic benefits for tourism industry and destinations","Mitigation":"Providing risk prevention measures, promoting safe travel practices, and addressing anxiety through communication and support","Technologies":"Health and safety protocols, communication technologies for anxiety support, and travel management systems","People":"Tourists, tourism providers, and local communities","Owner":"Tourism providers, healthcare professionals, and local governments"}]}
